title: An Inside Look at the Sonos Controller App
description:
http://www.sonos.com/music 
Sonos Controller App lets you control your Sonos wireless HiFi system for free right from your Android, iPhone, or iPad. Search for songs, browse music, and control the volume from anywhere. Play different songs in every room or play the same song everywhere in perfect sync.

Sonos Your Home 
All your music in every room in amazing HiFi sound. Wirelessly.  

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Sonos Home Audio products. Shop the full line of Sonos Home Audio products at Abt!
